name: jou
description: Game Jam template based on colyseus

scripts.build: yarn workspace @jou/common build && yarn workspace @jou/demo build && yarn workspace @jou/ld46 build && concurrently -n server,client "yarn workspace @jou/server build" "yarn workspace @jou/client build"
scripts.build:client: yarn workspace @jou/common build && yarn workspace @jou/demo build && yarn workspace @jou/ld46 build && yarn workspace @jou/client build
scripts.build:server: yarn workspace @jou/common build && yarn workspace @jou/demo build && yarn workspace @jou/ld46 build && yarn workspace @jou/server build
scripts.dev: concurrently -n common,demo,ld46,client,server "yarn workspace @jou/common dev" "yarn workspace @jou/demo dev" "yarn workspace @jou/ld46 dev" "yarn workspace @jou/client dev" "yarn workspace @jou/server dev"
scripts.dev:client: concurrently -n common,demo,ld46,client "yarn workspace @jou/common dev" "yarn workspace @jou/demo dev" "yarn workspace @jou/ld46 dev" "yarn workspace @jou/client dev --port $PORT"
scripts.dev:server: concurrently -n common,demo,ld46,server "yarn workspace @jou/common dev" "yarn workspace @jou/demo dev" "yarn workspace @jou/ld46 dev" "yarn workspace @jou/server dev"
